notes: Tasks v1.0: 35 implementation tasks (70-105 hours) covering 8 phases - Foundation & Audio System (Tasks 1-4), State Management (Tasks 5-8), UI Components - Drawer (Tasks 9-16), UI Components - Sheet (Tasks 17-21), Integration & Data Persistence (Tasks 22-25), Accessibility & Keyboard Support (Tasks 26-28), Error Handling & Edge Cases (Tasks 29-31), Testing & Quality Assurance (Tasks 32-35).
